title: Sterren Op De Dansvloer
overview: Famous faces who try to waltz, cha cha, paso doble, waltz, tango and other ballroom styles, that's what Star completely around on the Dance Floor.The personalities who dare to take the plunge into the polished parquet floor, can count on the intensive supervision and training of professional dancers.And of course, a professional jury will evaluate their performance and weekly viewers in Flanders see week after week how familiar faces turn out to experienced ballroom dancers.
